## Load the package

```{r}
library(TBSignatureProfiler)
library(glmnet)
library(ROCR)
library(bioDist)
library(readr)
library(boot)
library(gmodels)
library(DESeq2)
library(caret)
library(e1071)
```


## Data normalization

```{r}
data_toy_norm <- deseq2_norm_rle(TB_indian$count.indian)
```


## Signature evaluation 

```{r}
quantitative.result <- SignatureQuantitative(data_toy_norm,
                                             TB_indian$meta.indian$label,
                                             TBsignatures[c("ACS_COR_16","Predict29")],
                                             c("ACS_COR_16","Predict29"),
                                             num.boot = 5)
```
